pullRequest.title: Moving ALogger into the logging module
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
First part of the logging improvements: moving the class responsible for the colourful console logging into the logging module.
Fixed Issue(s)

nodes.bodyText: For future PRs, it would be helpful to do re-orderings in a separate PR.  If it bothers you feel free to put up a PR that just reorders them all. :)
